dialogue.question: Where is my order #ORD12345?
dialogue.answer: Let me check your order status for you. I can see your order ORD12345 is currently being processed at our fulfillment center.

dialogue.question: When will it arrive?
dialogue.answer: Based on your location and shipping method, your order should arrive within 3-5 business days.

dialogue.question: What's your return policy?
dialogue.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for most items. Items must be in original condition with tags attached.

dialogue.question: Do you have this shirt in size medium?
dialogue.answer: Let me check our inventory for you. Which specific shirt are you looking for?

dialogue.question: The blue cotton t-shirt on sale
dialogue.answer: Yes, we have the blue cotton t-shirt in medium size. It's currently on sale for $19.99.

dialogue.question: Can I get free shipping?
dialogue.answer: Free shipping is available on orders over $25. Your current order qualifies for free standard shipping.

dialogue.question: Pesanan saya belum sampai
dialogue.answer: Saya akan bantu cek status pesanan Anda. Bisa berikan nomor pesanan?

dialogue.question: Nomor pesanannya ORD67890
dialogue.answer: Pesanan ORD67890 sedang dalam perjalanan dan akan tiba besok.

dialogue.question: My payment failed but I was charged
dialogue.answer: I'm sorry to hear about the payment issue. Let me help you resolve this right away.

dialogue.question: When will I get my refund?
dialogue.answer: Refunds typically process within 3-5 business days. I'll escalate this to our billing team for faster resolution.

dialogue.question: Barang saya rosak sampai
dialogue.answer: Maaf mendengar produk yang rosak. Saya boleh bantu arrange replacement.

dialogue.question: Macam mana nak return?
dialogue.answer: Kami akan arrange courier pickup untuk item yang rosak tu.

dialogue.question: Bila dapat replacement?
dialogue.answer: Replacement akan sampai dalam 2-3 hari lepas kami receive return item.

dialogue.question: How do I cancel my order?
dialogue.answer: You can cancel your order if it hasn't been shipped yet. Let me check the status and help you cancel it.

dialogue.question: May discount ba kayo ngayon?
dialogue.answer: Meron kaming 15% off sa lahat ng summer items this week!

dialogue.question: Paano mag-apply ng discount code?
dialogue.answer: I-enter lang ang code 'SUMMER15' sa checkout page para ma-apply ang discount.

dialogue.question: I can't log into my account
dialogue.answer: I can help you with account access. Let me guide you through resetting your password.

dialogue.question: I didn't receive the reset email
dialogue.answer: Sometimes emails take a few minutes. Please check your spam folder, and I'll resend it for you.

dialogue.question: Can help me change delivery address?
dialogue.answer: Can lah! What's your order number and the new address?

dialogue.question: Order ORD11111, new address is Orchard Road
dialogue.answer: Okay, I've updated your delivery address to Orchard Road. Anything else?

dialogue.question: How much extra for same day delivery?
dialogue.answer: Same day delivery is $15 extra, but since you're in CBD area, can waive the fee for you!
